investigator.name: Investigator
investigator.mission: investigate players and deduct what team they belong to

mayor.name: Mayor
mayor.description: influential, sarcastic and a bit political

trapper.name: Trapper
trapper.mission: trap another player, blocking their ability

godfather.name: Godfather
godfather.description: say hello to their little friend >:)

mafioso.name: Mafioso
mafioso.description: a skilled and deadly member of the mafia
mafioso.mission: vote to kill another player during the night

surgeon.name: Surgeon
surgeon.description: you are a master of disguise, but just not with clothes
surgeon.mission: restructure someones face (or yours once) to make evil players look good

witch.name: Witch
witch.description: an infamous spell caster, known to use dark magic to get what you want
witch.mission: block someone's (except mafia) ability at night

framer.name: Framer
framer.description: you always tell the truth, just some parts of it ;)
framer.mission: frame another player, making them look like an evil player

executioner.name: Executioner
executioner.description: hiding in the shadows - waiting to strike
executioner.mission: Get your target voted out to win. You become the jester if your target dies at night

lawyer.name: Lawyer
lawyer.description: sharp and determined - your client comes first
lawyer.mission: make your client (evil or neutral) win
